      • longToBytes

        public static byte[] longToBytes(long v)
        Returns a byte array that represents the passed long. This was modified from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18687772/java-converting-long-to- bytes-which-approach-is-more-efficient
        Parameters:
        v - the long to be converted
        Returns:
        a byte array representing v
